00001 // Original code: http://remus.rutgers.edu/~rhoads/Code/random2.c
00002 
00003 /************************************************************************/
00004 /* concatenation of following two 16-bit multiply with carry generators */
00005 /* x(n)=a*x(n-1)+carry mod 2^16 and y(n)=b*y(n-1)+carry mod 2^16,       */
00006 /* number and carry packed within the same 32 bit integer.              */
00007 /************************************************************************/
00008 
00009 namespace Digipen
00010 {
00011 
00012 namespace Utils
00013 {
00014 
00015 static unsigned int SEED_X = 521288629;
00016 static unsigned int SEED_Y = 362436069;
00017 
00018 unsigned rand(void)
00019 {
00020   /* Use any pair of non-equal numbers from this list for "a" and "b"
00021       18000 18030 18273 18513 18879 19074 19098 19164 19215 19584
00022       19599 19950 20088 20508 20544 20664 20814 20970 21153 21243
00023       21423 21723 21954 22125 22188 22293 22860 22938 22965 22974
00024       23109 23124 23163 23208 23508 23520 23553 23658 23865 24114
00025       24219 24660 24699 24864 24948 25023 25308 25443 26004 26088
00026       26154 26550 26679 26838 27183 27258 27753 27795 27810 27834
00027       27960 28320 28380 28689 28710 28794 28854 28959 28980 29013
00028       29379 29889 30135 30345 30459 30714 30903 30963 31059 31083
00029   */
00030   static unsigned int a = 18000, b = 30903;
00031 
00032   SEED_X = a * (SEED_X & 65535) + (SEED_X >> 16);
00033   SEED_Y = b * (SEED_Y & 65535) + (SEED_Y >> 16);
00034 
00035   return ((SEED_X << 16) + (SEED_Y & 65535));
00036 }
00037 
00038 void srand(unsigned seed1, unsigned seed2)
00039 {
00040   if (seed1)
00041     SEED_X = seed1;   /* use default seeds if parameter is 0 */
00042   if (seed2)
00043     SEED_Y = seed2;
00044 }
00045 
00046 int Random(int low, int high)
00047 {
00048   int r1 = static_cast<int>( Digipen::Utils::rand() / 2 - 1 );
00049   return r1 % (high - low + 1) + low;
00050 }
00051 
00052 } // namespace Utils
00053 
00054 } // namespace Digipen
